chapter.para: The easiest way to get the stylesheets is to download the most recent distribution from GitHub. They are also available via Maven.
If you wish, you can also clone the distribution and build them yourself. The distribution is designed to be self contained. Running:

should build the stylesheets in build/xslt. (Use .\gradlew.bat makeXslt on Windows
In the spirit of full disclosure, builds are very rarely tested on Windows. If you encounter problems, please file an issue. .)
